Description:
Take the command of the most powerful army the ancient world, turn their country into a great empire and make enemies bow before your military, economic and political power. Of course, some will admire your progress, while others will be envious, it is possible that among the last will and your closest associates.

Will the traitors pay you a stab in the back, or are you a first down against old friends? How much you are willing to sacrifice for the sake of Rome was exactly the way you want it to be? Taking the title of Emperor, will you defend the republic, or turn into a brutal dictator?
